actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income amounts distributed from individual retirement accounts and certain qualified trusts which are attributable to tax-exempt interest.

summary.text: Municipal Finance Rescue Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income any distributions made from an individual retirement account or a qualified plan benefiting self-employed individuals or owner-employees to the extent such distributions are attributable to tax-exempt interest.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income amounts distributed from individual retirement accounts and certain qualified trusts which are attributable to tax-exempt interest.
